mapper.select: SELECT e.*, s.name AS student_name, c.course_name, t.name AS teacher_name FROM enrollment e JOIN student s ON e.student_id = s.student_id JOIN course c ON e.course_id = c.course_id JOIN teacher t ON e.teacher_id = t.teacher_id WHERE e.student_id = #{studentId}
mapper.update: UPDATE enrollment SET score = #{score}, status = 'finished', update_time = NOW() WHERE enrollment_id = #{enrollmentId}
